name: Monkey In The Jungle
description:
A cool hat is chosen for your monkey and fight against each other in the jungle. It's all about getting the powerful tree stick first and hitting the other to become the ultimate monkey winner of the jungle! 

Developed for the GameJam, Medialogy IKDU Game Jam 2021

Controls:

This game has controller support (Made for xbox 360 controllers):

left stick - movement

A - Light attack

B - Heavy attack

X - Dash

The only keyboard controls are:

WASD - movement

R - Light attack

T - Heavy attack

E - Dash
